title: Bimetallic nanozyme of Cu–Mn organophyllosilicate with enhanced multi-enzyme mimetic activity for simultaneous degradation of hydroquinone and methylene blue
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00692E, Paper
Rui Lv, Beibei He, Shiyong Sun, Ke Wang, Sen Lin, Elena Leonidovna Kotova, Jin Liu, Haoming Tang
This work presents a highly effective multi-enzyme like nanozyme with Mn–Cu as the catalytic centers. It was employed for the degradation of methylene blue (MB) mediated by hydroquinone (HQ), resulting in satisfactory co-degradation of MB and HQ.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
